author: GraemeLeggett
title: Not bad for what it is
review:
This came in a tin of Danish style biscuits - it was a promotional in Tesco.

 

Its nothing special in terms of a build but gave me a minifigure on the cheap - I think the biscuits cost all of 3 pounds - and a few specialist pieces. The pieces can be rejigged to give a couple of unusual flyers. So it was a bit of fun for a 30-year-old. The biscuits weren't bad either.
